name: Jail
long_description: A loud 'CLANK' hits your ears as your butt hits a slab of grey concrete.  It takes, like, a whole minute for your eyes to adjust to the budget lighting of your new surroundings. You immediately wish they hadn't wasted the cash on the single blinking bulb hanging directly from a wire in the center of the ceiling. You must be in some kind of waiting room to hell; off-white office equipment litters a couple of build-it-yourself desks and one squeaky office chairs overflows with a police officer typing with a single sausage-sized finger. Your gear has been confiscated and thrown on the unoccupied desk with complete lack of care. Across the bleak room is an even less appealing enclosure locked with steel bars and not much more than darkness inside. A metal door marks the entrance you must have been pushed in from and, incidentally, the only exit in sight.
short_description: Bored already. This rent-a-jail presided over by a discount cop is worse than being grounded for sure!

room_features.name: Your Gear
room_features.description: All the sweet stuff you've collected through all your adventures.

room_features.name: Unattended Police Desktop
room_features.description: Somebody forgot to log out... Don't they learn this stuff in the Academy?
room_features.description_hacked: Not only have you unlocked the doors, but you've also wiped your criminal record clean (again)... c00l!

room_features.name: Police Officer
room_features.description: Probably works for tips. The officer is leaning against the wall right next to... is that a [key] hanging on a hook right above his head?!

room_features.name: Unoccupied Desk
room_features.description: The new home of all your sweet gear... not. gonna. cry.

room_features.name: Metal Door
room_features.description: Locked tight. Controlled by a computer, it looks like. Only way out.
